segment.source: The Interactive logon: Prompt user to change password before expiration policy setting determines how many days in advance users are warned that their passwords are about to expire.
segment.target: The Interactive logon: Prompt user to change password before expiration policy setting determines how many days in advance users are warned that their passwords are about to expire.

segment.source: With this advance warning, the user has time to construct a password that is sufficiently strong.
segment.target: With this advance warning, the user has time to construct a password that is sufficiently strong.

segment.source: A user-defined number of days from 0 through 999.
segment.target: A user-defined number of days from 0 through 999.

segment.source: Configure user passwords to expire periodically.
segment.target: Configure user passwords to expire periodically.

segment.source: Users will need warning that their passwords are going to expire, or they might inadvertently get locked out of the system.
segment.target: Users will need warning that their passwords are going to expire, or they might inadvertently get locked out of the system.

segment.source: This could lead to confusion for users who access the network locally, or make it impossible for users who access the network through dial-up or virtual private network (VPN) connections to log on.
segment.target: This could lead to confusion for users who access the network locally, or make it impossible for users who access the network through dial-up or virtual private network (VPN) connections to log on.

segment.source: Set Interactive logon: Prompt user to change password before expiration to 5 days.
segment.target: Set Interactive logon: Prompt user to change password before expiration to 5 days.

segment.source: When their password expiration date is 5 or fewer days away, users will see a dialog box each time they log on to the domain.
segment.target: When their password expiration date is 5 or fewer days away, users will see a dialog box each time they log on to the domain.

segment.source: Do not set the value to 0, which results in displaying the password expiration warning every time the user logs on.
